entry.title: empty -- node_handle
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/node_handle/node_handle/empty.md b/reference/node_handle/node_handle/empty.md
index e544cb4dc..deca155fc 100644
--- a/reference/node_handle/node_handle/empty.md
+++ b/reference/node_handle/node_handle/empty.md
@@ -6,9 +6,9 @@
 * [meta namespace]
 
 ```cpp
-bool empty() const noexcept;
-[[nodiscard]] bool empty() const noexcept; // C++20
-bool empty() const noexcept;               // C++26
+bool empty() const noexcept;               // (1) C++17
+[[nodiscard]] bool empty() const noexcept; // (1) C++20
+constexpr bool empty() const noexcept;     // (1) C++26
 ```
 
 ## 概要
@@ -50,3 +50,4 @@ true
     - C++20で`[[nodiscard]]`が付加された
 - [P2422R1 Remove `nodiscard` annotations from the standard library specification](https://open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2024/p2422r1.html)
     - C++26で`[[nodiscard]]`指定が削除された
+- [P3372R3 constexpr containers and adaptors](https://open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2025/p3372r3.html)

index a2ba4f1dc..8d1d2a3a5 100644
--- a/reference/node_handle/node_handle/swap.md
+++ b/reference/node_handle/node_handle/swap.md
@@ -6,9 +6,14 @@
 * [meta namespace]
 
 ```cpp
-void swap(node_handle&)
+void
+  swap(node_handle&)
     noexcept(ator_traits::propagate_on_container_swap::value ||
-             ator_traits::is_always_equal::value);
+             ator_traits::is_always_equal::value); // (1) C++17
+constexpr void
+  swap(node_handle&)
+    noexcept(ator_traits::propagate_on_container_swap::value ||
+             ator_traits::is_always_equal::value); // (1) C++26
 ```
 
 ## 概要
@@ -92,3 +97,4 @@ node2 : [10, a]
 
 ## 参照
 - [Splicing Maps and Sets(Revision 5)](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2016/p0083r3.pdf)

entry.title: contains -- multimap
entry.summary:
diff --git a/reference/map/multimap/contains.md b/reference/map/multimap/contains.md
index c13b61775..97849403b 100644
--- a/reference/map/multimap/contains.md
+++ b/reference/map/multimap/contains.md
@@ -6,10 +6,13 @@
 * cpp20[meta cpp]
 
 ```cpp
-bool contains(const key_type& x) const; // (1)
+bool contains(const key_type& x) const;           // (1) C++20
+constexpr bool contains(const key_type& x) const; // (1) C++26
 
 template <class K>
-bool contains(const K& x) const;        // (2)
+bool contains(const K& x) const;           // (2) C++20

+constexpr bool contains(const K& x) const; // (2) C++26
 ```
 
 
@@ -75,3 +78,4 @@ contain
 
 ## 参照
 - [P0458R2 Checking for Existence of an Element in Associative Containers](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2018/p0458r2.html)

 	- (3)と(4)のオーバーロードについて、有効性が継続される対象が、`*i`となっていたが、`*++i`の間違いであったため、C++14で修正された。

 ```cpp
 namespace std {
   template <class T, class Allocator>
-  void swap(forward_list<T, Allocator>& x,
-            forward_list<T, Allocator>& y);  // (1) C++11
-
+  void
+    swap(forward_list<T, Allocator>& x,
+         forward_list<T, Allocator>& y); // (1) C++11
+  template <class T, class Allocator>
+  void
+    swap(forward_list<T,Allocator>& x,
+         forward_list<T,Allocator>& y)
+      noexcept(noexcept(x.swap(y)));     // (1) C++17
   template <class T, class Allocator>
-  void swap(forward_list<T,Allocator>& x,
-            forward_list<T,Allocator>& y)
-              noexcept(noexcept(x.swap(y))); // (1) C++17
+  constexpr void
+    swap(forward_list<T,Allocator>& x,
+         forward_list<T,Allocator>& y)
+      noexcept(noexcept(x.swap(y)));     // (1) C++26
 }
 ```
